tool_description: 🟢🟢Get sneakers prices in real time (+10 platforms)🟢🟢
name: Sneakers Real Time Pricing
title: Sneakers Real Time Pricing

api_list.name: brands
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sneakers-real-time-pricing.p.rapidapi.com/sneakers/brands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sneakers-real-time-pricing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
